text:
The concept for this year's show is to create
something that will appeal to a younger audience

Our aim is to express the inner struggles of young people
powerfully and gain their empathy, so to speak.

So we're planning to match up artists who fit the image
and proceed with that──

Things like this,
tend to be well-received────

You guys............
Are you sure... about this............?
You seem lost in thought, are you okay............?
